UI\\\"\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Hello! \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"My name is Taras, and I am the head of Quality Engineering in Poland. Responsible for the initiatives, development, and growth of QA specialists at EPAM Poland. Glad to see you as part of our testing team!  \\nWe will work together on a vast number of exciting tasks and meet during various events and extra activities, so be ready for an exciting journey to start. \\nMaybe you’ve heard the phrase: think globally, act locally. So, we gather our global success from the local achievements of each of us.   \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What time is it? It’s time to show who is the testing star! \",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"#444444\",\"background\":\"white\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"#444444\",\"background\":\"white\"}}}]}]}]}}"
